markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Adopted Ancestry](/Feats.aspx?ID=751) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="General" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=78" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 258 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You’re fully immersed in another ancestry’s culture and traditions, whether born into them, earned through rite of passage, or bonded through a deep friendship or romance. Choose a common ancestry. You can select ancestry feats from the ancestry you chose, in addition to your character’s own ancestry, as long as the ancestry feats don’t require any physiological feature that you lack, as determined by the GM.
name: Adopted Ancestry
search_markdown:
<traits>
<trait label="General" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=78" />
</traits>

<additional-info>
<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 258 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

</additional-info>

---

<summary>
Gain access to ancestry feats from another ancestry.
</summary>
summary: Gain access to ancestry feats from another ancestry.
summary_markdown: Gain access to ancestry feats from another ancestry.
text: <title level="1" right="Feat 1" pfs="Standard" > Adopted Ancestry Source Core Rulebook pg. 258 4.0 --- You’re fully immersed in another ancestry’s culture and traditions, whether born into them, earned through rite of passage, or bonded through a deep friendship or romance. Choose a common ancestry. You can select ancestry feats from the ancestry you chose, in addition to your character’s own ancestry, as long as the ancestry feats don’t require any physiological feature that you lack, as determined by the GM.
